00009 {
00010         $url  ="index.php?_ScriptTransport_id=1&_ScriptTransport_data={";
00011         $url .="%22service%22:%22" . $_POST['service'] . "%22,%22method%22:%22" . $_POST['method']. "%22,";
00012         $url .="%22id%22:3,%22params%22:[";
00013         $params = array();
00014         foreach ( $_POST['params'] as $param )
00015         {
00016                 if ( $param )
00017                 {
00018                         if( is_numeric($param) or strstr("true false null", $param) 
00019                                 or preg_match("/^[{[].*[}\]]$/",$param) )
00020                         {
00021                                 $params[] = stripslashes($param);
00022                         }
00023                         else
00024                         {
00025                                 $params[] = '"' . $param . '"';
00026                         }
00027                 }
00028         }
00029         $url .= implode(",", $params) . "],%22server_data%22}";
00030         header("location: $url");
00031         exit;   
00032 }
